hasDitaContent.@value: Both idarubicin and vinflunine can increase the risk of myelosuppression.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Both  idarubicin  and  vinflunine  can increase the risk of myelosuppression.

hasDitaContent.@value: Both idarubicin and vinorelbine can increase the risk of myelosuppression.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Both  idarubicin  and  vinorelbine  can increase the risk of myelosuppression.

hasDitaContent.@value: Yellow fever vaccine, live is predicted to increase the risk of generalised infection (possibly life-threatening) when given with idarubicin. UKHSA advises avoid (refer to Green Book).

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Yellow fever vaccine, live   is predicted to   increase   the risk of generalised infection (possibly life-threatening) when given with   idarubicin .  UKHSA advises avoid (refer to Green Book) .
